titleStmt.title: Love and charity presented in a copy of verses to his worthy masters in the ward of St. Giles's Cripplegate without. / By William Briscoe, bell-man within the Freedom.
titleStmt.author: Briscoe, William.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Y'are welcome masters all to Christmass Day ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
